DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy Stealth liposomal doxorubicin hydrochloride ( DOX-SL ) treatment moderate severe AIDS-related Kaposi 's sarcoma ( KS ) comparison establish therapy BV ( bleomycin/vincristine ) . To evaluate safety tolerance DOX-SL compare BV population AIDS patient moderate severe KS .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized , Comparative Trial DOX-SL ( Stealth Liposomal Doxorubicin Hydrochloride ) Versus Bleomycin Vincristine Treatment AIDS-Related Kaposi 's Sarcoma
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive either DOX-SL BV combination . Infusions give day 1 every 3 week total six cycle . Kaposi 's sarcoma lesion evaluate prior every cycle , end last treatment cycle , 4 week follow end last treatment . Patients respond therapy follow every 2 month 1 year . Patients must agree one representative KS lesion biopsied .
